   Ṛgveda 1	Ṛgveda 1
   RV_1,001.01a agnim īḷe purohitaṃ yajñasya devam ṛtvijam |	RV_1,001.01a agnim I?e purohitam yajQasya devam Rtvijam |
   RV_1,001.01c hotāraṃ ratnadhātamam ||	RV_1,001.01t hotAram ratnaDAtamam ||
   RV_1,001.02a agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir īḍyo nūtanair uta |	RV_1,001.02a agniH pUrveBiH RziBiH IxyaH nUtanEH uta |
   RV_1,001.02c sa devāṃ eha vakṣati ||	RV_1,001.02c sa devAm eha vakzati ||
   RV_1,001.03a agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva dive dive |	RV_1,001.03a agninA rayim aSna vat pozam eva dive dive |
   RV_1,001.03c yaśasaṃ vīravattamam ||	RV_1,001.03t yaSasam vIravattamam ||

   RV_1,001.04c sa id deveṣu gacchati ||	RV_1,001.04c saH id devezu gacCati ||

   RV_1,001.05c devo devebhir ā gamat ||	RV_1,001.05t devaH deveBiH A gamat ||

   RV_1,001.06c tavet tat satyam aṅgiraḥ ||	RV_1,001.06c tavet tat satyam aFgiraH ||

   RV_1,001.08c vardhamānaṃ sve dame ||	RV_1,001.08t varDamAnam sve dame ||

   Ṛgveda 4	Ṛgveda 4
   RV_4,001.01a tvāṃ hy agne sadam it samanyavo devāso devam aratiṃ nyerira	RV_4,001.01a tvAm hi agne sadam id sa manyavaH devAsaH devam aratim nyerira

   RV_5,002.11a etaṃ te stomaṃ tuvijāta vipro rathaṃ na dhīraḥ svapā atakṣam	RV_5,002.11aH etam te stomam tuvijAta vipraH raTam na DIraH svapAH atakzam

   RV_6,001.01a tvaṃ hy agne prathamo manotāsyā dhiyo abhavo dasma hotā |	RV_6,001.01a tvam hi agne praTamaH manotA asyAH DiyaH aBavaH dasma hotA |

   gman ||	gman ||

   RV_6,001.04c nāmāni cid dadhire yajñiyāni bhadrāyāṃ te raṇayanta saṃdṛṣṭau	RV_6,001.04d nAmAni cit daDire yajQiyAni BadrAyAm te raNayanta saMdRzwO

   RV_6,075.08a rathavāhanaṃ havir asya nāma yatrāyudhaṃ nihitam asya varma |	RV_6,075.08a raTa vAhanam haviH asya nAma yatra AyuDam nihitam asya varma |
   RV_6,075.08c tatrā ratham upa śagmaṃ sadema viśvāhā vayaṃ sumanasyamānāḥ	RV_6,075.08c tatrA raTam upa Sagmam sadema viSvAhAH vayam sumanasyamAnAH
   RV_6,075.09a svāduṣaṃsadaḥ pitaro vayodhāḥ kṛcchreśritaḥ śaktīvanto	RV_6,075.09a svAdu zaMsadaH pitaraH vayoDAH kRcCreSritaH SaktIvantaH 
   gabhīrāḥ |	gaBIrAH |
   RV_6,075.09c citrasenā iṣubalā amṛdhrāḥ satovīrā uravo vrātasāhāḥ ||	RV_6,075.09c citrasenAH izu balAH amRDrAH satovIrAH uravaH vrAta sAhAH ||
   RV_6,075.10a brāhmaṇāsaḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ śive no dyāvāpṛthivī anehasā |	RV_6,075.10a brAhmaNAsaH pitaraH somyAsaH Sive naH dyAvApRTivI anehasA |
   RV_6,075.10c pūṣā naḥ pātu duritād ṛtāvṛdho rakṣā mākir no aghaśaṃsa īśata	RV_6,075.10c pUzA naH pAtu duritAt RtAvRDaH rakzA mAkiH naH aGa SaMsaH ISata
   RV_6,075.11a suparṇaṃ vaste mṛgo asyā danto gobhiḥ saṃnaddhā patati	RV_6,075.11a suparNam vaH te mRgaH asyAH dantaH goBiH saMnadDA patati
   prasūtā |	prasUtA |
   RV_6,075.11c yatrā naraḥ saṃ ca vi ca dravanti tatrāsmabhyam iṣavaḥ śarma	RV_6,075.11t yatrA naraH sam ca vi ca dravanti tatra asmaByam izavaH Sarma
   yaṃsan ||	yaMsan ||
   RV_6,075.12a ṛjīte pari vṛṅdhi no 'śmā bhavatu nas tanūḥ |	RV_6,075.12aH RjIte pari vRFDi naH aSmA Bavatu naH tanUH |
   RV_6,075.12c somo adhi bravītu no 'ditiḥ śarma yacchatu ||	RV_6,075.12d somaH aDi bravItu naH aditiH Sarma yacCatu ||
   RV_6,075.13a ā jaṅghanti sānv eṣāṃ jaghanāṃ upa jighnate |	RV_6,075.13aH A jaFGanti sA anu ezAm jaGanAm upa jiGnate |
   RV_6,075.13c aśvājani pracetaso 'śvān samatsu codaya ||	RV_6,075.13c aSva ajani pracetasaH aSvAn samatsu codaya ||
   RV_6,075.14a ahir iva bhogaiḥ pary eti bāhuṃ jyāyā hetim paribādhamānaḥ |	RV_6,075.14aH ahiH iva BogEH pari eti bAhum jyAyAH hetim paribADamAnaH |
   RV_6,075.14c hastaghno viśvā vayunāni vidvān pumān pumāṃsam pari pātu	RV_6,075.14t hasta GnaH viSvA vayunAni vidvAn pumAn pumAMsam pari pAtu
   viśvataḥ ||	viSvatas ||
   RV_6,075.15a ālāktā yā ruruśīrṣṇy atho yasyā ayo mukham |	RV_6,075.15aH AlAktA yA ruru SIrzNi aTo yasyAH ayaH muKam |
   RV_6,075.15c idam parjanyaretasa iṣvai devyai bṛhan namaḥ ||	RV_6,075.15t idam parjanya retasaH izvE devyE bRhat namaH ||
   RV_6,075.16a avasṛṣṭā parā pata śaravye brahmasaṃśite |	RV_6,075.16a avasRzwA parA pata Saravye brahma saMSite |
   RV_6,075.16c gacchāmitrān pra padyasva māmīṣāṃ kaṃ canoc chiṣaḥ ||	RV_6,075.16t gacCa amitrAn pra padyasva mA amIzAm kam canot SizaH ||
   RV_6,075.17a yatra bāṇāḥ sampatanti kumārā viśikhā iva |	RV_6,075.17a yatra bANAH sampatanti kumArAH viSiKAH iva |
   RV_6,075.17c tatrā no brahmaṇas patir aditiḥ śarma yacchatu viśvāhā śarma	RV_6,075.17d tatrA naH brahmaNaH patiH aditiH Sarma yacCatu viSvAhA Sarma
   yacchatu ||	yacCatu ||
   RV_6,075.18a marmāṇi te varmaṇā chādayāmi somas tvā rājāmṛtenānu vastām |	RV_6,075.18a marmANi te varmaNA CAdayAmi somaH tvA rAjA amRtena anu vastAm |
   RV_6,075.18c uror varīyo varuṇas te kṛṇotu jayantaṃ tvānu devā madantu ||	RV_6,075.18d uroH varIyaH varuNaH te kRNotu jayantam tvA anu devAH madantu ||
   RV_6,075.19a yo naḥ svo araṇo yaś ca niṣṭyo jighāṃsati |	RV_6,075.19a yaH naH svaH araNaH yaH ca nizwyaH jiGAMsati |
   RV_6,075.19c devās taṃ sarve dhūrvantu brahma varma mamāntaram ||	RV_6,075.19t devAH tam sarve DUrvantu brahma varma mama antaram ||
   Ṛgveda 7	Ṛgveda 7
   RV_7,001.01a agniṃ naro dīdhitibhir araṇyor hastacyutī janayanta praśastam	RV_7,001.01a agnim naraH dIDitiBiH araNyoH hasta cyutI janayanta praSastam
   RV_7,001.01c dūredṛśaṃ gṛhapatim atharyum ||	RV_7,001.01t dUra IdRSam gRhapatim aTaryum ||
   RV_7,001.02a tam agnim aste vasavo ny ṛṇvan supraticakṣam avase kutaś cit	RV_7,001.02a tam agnim aste vasavaH ni RNvan su praticakzam avase kutas cit 
   RV_7,001.02c dakṣāyyo yo dama āsa nityaḥ ||	RV_7,001.02t dakzAyyaH yaH damaH Asa nityaH ||
   RV_7,001.03a preddho agne dīdihi puro no 'jasrayā sūrmyā yaviṣṭha |	RV_7,001.03a predDaH agne dIdihi puras naH ajasrayA sUrmyA yavizWa |
   RV_7,001.03c tvāṃ śaśvanta upa yanti vājāḥ ||	RV_7,001.03d tvAm SaSvantaH upa yanti vAjAH ||
   RV_7,001.04a pra te agnayo 'gnibhyo varaṃ niḥ suvīrāsaḥ śośucanta	RV_7,001.04a pra te agnayaH agniByaH varam niH su vIrAsaH SoSucanta
   dyumantaḥ |	dyumantaH |
   RV_7,001.04c yatrā naraḥ samāsate sujātāḥ ||	RV_7,001.04t yatrA naraH samAsate sujAtAH ||
   RV_7,001.05a dā no agne dhiyā rayiṃ suvīraṃ svapatyaṃ sahasya praśastam |	RV_7,001.05a dAH naH agne DiyA rayim su vIram svapatyam sahasya praSastam |
   RV_7,001.05c na yaṃ yāvā tarati yātumāvān ||	RV_7,001.05d na yam yAvA tarati yAtum AvAn ||
   RV_7,001.06a upa yam eti yuvatiḥ sudakṣaṃ doṣā vastor haviṣmatī ghṛtācī |	RV_7,001.06aH upa yam eti yuvatiH sudakzam dozAH vastoH havizmatI GRtAcI |
   RV_7,001.06c upa svainam aramatir vasūyuḥ ||	RV_7,001.06c upa sva enam aramatiH vasUyuH ||
   RV_7,001.07a viśvā agne 'pa dahārātīr yebhis tapobhir adaho jarūtham |	RV_7,001.07a viSvAH agne apa dahArAtIH yeBiH tapoBiH adaho jarUTam |
   RV_7,001.07c pra nisvaraṃ cātayasvāmīvām ||	RV_7,001.07c pra nisvaram cAtayasva amIvAm ||
   RV_7,001.08a ā yas te agna idhate anīkaṃ vasiṣṭha śukra dīdivaḥ pāvaka |	RV_7,001.08aH A yaH te agne iDate anIkam vasizWa Sukra dIdivaH pAvakaH |
   RV_7,001.08c uto na ebhi stavathair iha syāḥ ||	RV_7,001.08c utas naH eBi stavaTEH iha syAH ||
   RV_7,001.09a vi ye te agne bhejire anīkam martā naraḥ pitryāsaḥ purutrā |	RV_7,001.09a vi ye te agne Bejire anIkam martAH naraH pitryAsaH purutrAH |
   RV_7,001.09c uto na ebhiḥ sumanā iha syāḥ ||	RV_7,001.09c utas naH eBiH sumanAH iha syAH ||
   RV_7,001.10a ime naro vṛtrahatyeṣu śūrā viśvā adevīr abhi santu māyāḥ |	RV_7,001.10aH ime naraH vRtrahatyezu SUrAH viSvAH adevIH aBi santu mAyAH |
   RV_7,001.10c ye me dhiyam panayanta praśastām ||	RV_7,001.10t ye me Diyam panayanta praSastAm ||
   RV_7,001.11a mā śūne agne ni ṣadāma nṛṇām māśeṣaso 'vīratā pari tvā |	RV_7,001.11a mA SUne agne ni zadAma nRNAm mASezasaH avIra tA pari tvA |
   RV_7,001.11c prajāvatīṣu duryāsu durya ||	RV_7,001.11c prajAvatIzu duryAsu duryaH ||
   RV_7,001.12a yam aśvī nityam upayāti yajñam prajāvantaṃ svapatyaṃ kṣayaṃ	RV_7,001.12a yam aSvI nityam upayAti yajQam prajAvantam svapatyam kzayam
   naḥ |	naH |
   RV_7,001.12c svajanmanā śeṣasā vāvṛdhānam ||	RV_7,001.12d sva janmanA SezasA vAvRDAnam ||
   RV_7,001.13a pāhi no agne rakṣaso ajuṣṭāt pāhi dhūrter araruṣo aghāyoḥ |	RV_7,001.13a pAhi naH agne rakzasaH ajuzwAt pAhi DUrteH ara ruzaH aGAyoH |
   RV_7,001.13c tvā yujā pṛtanāyūṃr abhi ṣyām ||	RV_7,001.13c tvA yujA pRtanAyUMr aBi zyAm ||
   RV_7,001.14a sed agnir agnīṃr aty astv anyān yatra vājī tanayo vīḷupāṇiḥ |	RV_7,001.14a set agniH agnIMr ati astu anyAn yatra vAjI tanayaH vI?upANiH |
   RV_7,001.14c sahasrapāthā akṣarā sameti ||	RV_7,001.14c sahasrapATAH akzarA sameti ||
   RV_7,001.15a sed agnir yo vanuṣyato nipāti sameddhāram aṃhasa uruṣyāt |	RV_7,001.15a set agniH yaH vanuzyataH nipAti samedDAram aMhasaH uruzyAt |
   RV_7,001.15c sujātāsaḥ pari caranti vīrāḥ ||	RV_7,001.15c su jAta AsaH pari caranti vIrAH ||
   RV_7,001.16a ayaṃ so agnir āhutaḥ purutrā yam īśānaḥ sam id indhe haviṣmān	RV_7,001.16aH ayam saH agniH AhutaH purutrAH yam ISAnaH sam id inDe havizmAn
   RV_7,001.16c pari yam ety adhvareṣu hotā ||	RV_7,001.16d pari yam eti aDvarezu hotA ||
   RV_7,001.17a tve agna āhavanāni bhūrīśānāsa ā juhuyāma nityā |	RV_7,001.17a tve agne AhavanAni BUH i ISAnAsaH A juhuyAma nityAH |
   RV_7,001.17c ubhā kṛṇvanto vahatū miyedhe ||	RV_7,001.17c uBA kRNvantaH vahatU miyeDe ||
   RV_7,001.18a imo agne vītatamāni havyājasro vakṣi devatātim accha |	RV_7,001.18aH imaH agne vItatamAni havya ajasraH vakzi devatAtim acCa |
   RV_7,001.18c prati na īṃ surabhīṇi vyantu ||	RV_7,001.18c prati naH Im suraBINi vyantu ||

   RV_7,001.19c mā naḥ kṣudhe mā rakṣasa ṛtāvo mā no dame mā vana ā juhūrthāḥ	RV_7,001.19c mA naH kzuDe mA rakzasaH RtAvaH mA naH dame mA vane A juhUrTAH
   RV_7,001.20a nū me brahmāṇy agna uc chaśādhi tvaṃ deva maghavadbhyaḥ	RV_7,001.20a nU me brahmANi agne ud SaSADi tvam deva maGavadByaH
   suṣūdaḥ |	suzUdaH |
   RV_7,001.20c rātau syāmobhayāsa ā te yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||	RV_7,001.20d rAtO syAma uBayAsaH A te yUyam pAta svastiBiH sadA naH ||
   RV_7,001.21a tvam agne suhavo raṇvasaṃdṛk sudītī sūno sahaso didīhi |	RV_7,001.21a tvam agne suhavaH raNva saMdRS sudItI sUno sahasaH didIhi |
   RV_7,001.21c mā tve sacā tanaye nitya ā dhaṅ mā vīro asman naryo vi dāsīt	RV_7,001.21c mA tve sacA tanaye nitya A Dak mA vIraH asmat naryaH vi dAsIt 
   RV_7,001.22a mā no agne durbhṛtaye sacaiṣu deveddheṣv agniṣu pra vocaḥ |	RV_7,001.22a mA naH agne durBRtaye sacEzu deva idDezu agnizu pra vocaH |
   RV_7,001.22c mā te asmān durmatayo bhṛmāc cid devasya sūno sahaso naśanta	RV_7,001.22c mA te asmAn durmatayaH BRmAt cit devasya sUno sahasaH naSanta
   RV_7,001.23a sa marto agne svanīka revān amartye ya ājuhoti havyam |	RV_7,001.23a sa martaH agne svanIka revAn amartye yaH Ajuhoti havyam |
   RV_7,001.23c sa devatā vasuvaniṃ dadhāti yaṃ sūrir arthī pṛcchamāna eti ||	RV_7,001.23c sa devatA vasu vanim daDAti yam sUriH arTI pRcCamAnaH eti ||
   RV_7,001.24a maho no agne suvitasya vidvān rayiṃ sūribhya ā vahā bṛhantam	RV_7,001.24a mahaH naH agne suvitasya vidvAn rayim sUriByaH A vahAH bRhantam
   RV_7,001.24c yena vayaṃ sahasāvan mademāvikṣitāsa āyuṣā suvīrāḥ ||	RV_7,001.24t yena vayam sahasA vat mademAvikzitAsaH AyuzA su vIrAH ||
   RV_7,001.25a nū me brahmāṇy agna uc chaśādhi tvaṃ deva maghavadbhyaḥ	RV_7,001.25a nU me brahmANi agne ud SaSADi tvam deva maGavadByaH
   suṣūdaḥ |	suzUdaH |
   RV_7,001.25c rātau syāmobhayāsa ā te yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||	RV_7,001.25d rAtO syAma uBayAsaH A te yUyam pAta svastiBiH sadA naH ||
   RV_7,002.01a juṣasva naḥ samidham agne adya śocā bṛhad yajataṃ dhūmam	RV_7,002.01a juzasva naH samiDam agne adya SocAH bRhat yajatam DUmam
   ṛṇvan |	RNvan |
   RV_7,002.01c upa spṛśa divyaṃ sānu stūpaiḥ saṃ raśmibhis tatanaḥ sūryasya	RV_7,002.01c upa spRSa divyam sa anu stUpEH sam raSmiBiH tatanaH sUryasya
   RV_7,002.02a narāśaṃsasya mahimānam eṣām upa stoṣāma yajatasya yajñaiḥ |	RV_7,002.02a narASaMsasya mahimAnam ezAm upa stozAma yajatasya yajQEH |
   RV_7,002.02c ye sukratavaḥ śucayo dhiyandhāḥ svadanti devā ubhayāni havyā	RV_7,002.02t ye sukratavaH SucayaH DiyanDAH svadanti devAH uBayAni havyA
   RV_7,002.03a īḷenyaṃ vo asuraṃ sudakṣam antar dūtaṃ rodasī satyavācam |	RV_7,002.03aH I?enyam vaH asuram sudakzam antar dUtam rodasI satya vAcam |
   RV_7,002.03c manuṣvad agnim manunā samiddhaṃ sam adhvarāya sadam in mahema	RV_7,002.03c manuzvat agnim manunA samidDam sam aDvarAya sadam id mahema
   RV_7,002.04a saparyavo bharamāṇā abhijñu pra vṛñjate namasā barhir agnau |	RV_7,002.04a sa paryavaH BaramANAH aBijQu pra vRQjate namasA barhiH agnO |
   RV_7,002.04c ājuhvānā ghṛtapṛṣṭham pṛṣadvad adhvaryavo haviṣā marjayadhvam	RV_7,002.04t AjuhvAnA GRta pRzWam pRzadvat aDvaryavaH havizA marjayaDvam
   RV_7,002.05a svādhyo vi duro devayanto 'śiśrayū rathayur devatātā |	RV_7,002.05a su ADyaH vi duraH devayantaH aSiSrayuH raTayuH devatAtA |
   RV_7,002.05c pūrvī śiśuṃ na mātarā rihāṇe sam agruvo na samaneṣv añjan ||	RV_7,002.05c pUrvI SiSum na mAtarA rihANe sam agruvaH na samanezu aQjan ||
   RV_7,002.06a uta yoṣaṇe divye mahī na uṣāsānaktā sudugheva dhenuḥ |	RV_7,002.06aH uta yozaNe divye mahI naH uzAsAn aktA su duGA iva DenuH |
   RV_7,002.06c barhiṣadā puruhūte maghonī ā yajñiye suvitāya śrayetām ||	RV_7,002.06c barhizadA puruhUte maGonI A yajQiye suvitAya SrayetAm ||
   RV_7,002.07a viprā yajñeṣu mānuṣeṣu kārū manye vāṃ jātavedasā yajadhyai |	RV_7,002.07a viprAH yajQezu mAnuzezu kArU manye vAm jAtavedasA yajaDyE |
   RV_7,002.07c ūrdhvaṃ no adhvaraṃ kṛtaṃ haveṣu tā deveṣu vanatho vāryāṇi ||	RV_7,002.07t UrDvam naH aDvaram kRtam havezu tAH devezu vanaTaH vAryANi ||
   RV_7,002.08a ā bhāratī bhāratībhiḥ sajoṣā iḷā devair manuṣyebhir agniḥ |	RV_7,002.08aH A BAratI BAratIBiH sa jozAH i?A devEH manuzyeBiH agniH |
   RV_7,002.08c sarasvatī sārasvatebhir arvāk tisro devīr barhir edaṃ sadantu	RV_7,002.08c sarasvatI sArasvateBiH arvAk tisraH devIH barhiH edam sa dantu
   RV_7,002.09a tan nas turīpam adha poṣayitnu deva tvaṣṭar vi rarāṇaḥ syasva	RV_7,002.09a tat naH turIpam aDa pozayitnu deva tvazwar vi rarANaH syasva
   RV_7,002.09c yato vīraḥ karmaṇyaḥ sudakṣo yuktagrāvā jāyate devakāmaḥ ||	RV_7,002.09t yatas vIraH karmaNyaH sudakzaH yukta grAvA jAyate deva kAmaH ||
   RV_7,002.10a vanaspate 'va sṛjopa devān agnir haviḥ śamitā sūdayāti |	RV_7,002.10a vanaspate ava sRja upa devAn agniH haviH SamitA sUdayAti |
   RV_7,002.10c sed u hotā satyataro yajāti yathā devānāṃ janimāni veda ||	RV_7,002.10c set u hotA satyataraH yajAti yaTA devAnAm janimAni veda ||
   RV_7,002.11a ā yāhy agne samidhāno arvāṅ indreṇa devaiḥ sarathaṃ turebhiḥ	RV_7,002.11aH A yAhi agne samiDAnaH arvAF indreNa devEH sa raTam tureBiH
   RV_7,002.11c barhir na āstām aditiḥ suputrā svāhā devā amṛtā mādayantām ||	RV_7,002.11t barhiH naH AstAm aditiH su putrA svAhA devAH amRtAH mAdayantAm ||
   RV_7,003.01a agniṃ vo devam agnibhiḥ sajoṣā yajiṣṭhaṃ dūtam adhvare	RV_7,003.01a agnim vaH devam agniBiH sa jozAH yajizWam dUtam aDvare
   kṛṇudhvam |	kRNuDvam |
   RV_7,003.01c yo martyeṣu nidhruvir ṛtāvā tapurmūrdhā ghṛtānnaḥ pāvakaḥ ||	RV_7,003.01t yaH martyezu niDruviH RtOvA tapuH mUrDA GRtAn naH pAvakaH ||
   RV_7,003.02a prothad aśvo na yavase 'viṣyan yadā mahaḥ saṃvaraṇād vy	RV_7,003.02a proTat aSvaH na yavase avizyan yadA mahaH saMvaraNAt vy
   asthāt |	asTAt |
   RV_7,003.02c ād asya vāto anu vāti śocir adha sma te vrajanaṃ kṛṣṇam asti	RV_7,003.02 At asya vAtaH anu vAti SociH aDa sma te vrajanam kRzNam asti
   RV_7,003.03a ud yasya te navajātasya vṛṣṇo 'gne caranty ajarā idhānāḥ |	RV_7,003.03aH ud yasya te nava jAtasya vRzNaH agne caranti ajarAH iDAnAH |
   RV_7,003.03c acchā dyām aruṣo dhūma eti saṃ dūto agna īyase hi devān ||	RV_7,003.03c acCA dyAm aruzaH DUmaH eti sam dUtaH agne Iyase hi devAn ||
   RV_7,003.04a vi yasya te pṛthivyām pājo aśret tṛṣu yad annā samavṛkta	RV_7,003.04a vi yasya te pRTivyAm pAjaH aSret tRzu yat annA samavRkta
   jambhaiḥ |	jamBEH |
   RV_7,003.04c seneva sṛṣṭā prasitiṣ ṭa eti yavaṃ na dasma juhvā vivekṣi ||	RV_7,003.04c senA iva sRzwA prasitiH waH eti yavam na dasma juhvA vivekzi ||

   RV_7,101.05c mayobhuvo vṛṣṭayaḥ santv asme supippalā oṣadhīr devagopāḥ ||	RV_7,101.05t mayaH BuvaH vRzwayaH santu asme su pippalAH ozaDIH deva gopAH ||
   RV_7,101.06a sa retodhā vṛṣabhaḥ śaśvatīnāṃ tasminn ātmā jagatas tasthuṣaś	RV_7,101.06a sa retoDAH vRzaBaH SaSvatInAm tasmin AtmA jagataH tasTuzaH 
   ca |	ca |

   RV_8,001.01a mā cid anyad vi śaṃsata sakhāyo mā riṣaṇyata |	RV_8,001.01a mA cit anyat vi SaMsata saKAyaH mA rizaNyate |
   RV_8,001.01c indram it stotā vṛṣaṇaṃ sacā sute muhur ukthā ca śaṃsata ||	RV_8,001.01t indram id stotA vRzaNam sacA sute muhur ukTA ca SaMsate ||
   RV_8,001.02a avakrakṣiṇaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ yathājuraṃ gāṃ na carṣaṇīsaham |	RV_8,001.02a avakrakziNam vRzaBam yaTA Ajuram gAm na ca RzaNI saham |
   RV_8,001.02c vidveṣaṇaṃ saṃvananobhayaṅkaram maṃhiṣṭham ubhayāvinam ||	RV_8,001.02t vidvezaNam saMvanana uBayaFkaram maMhizWam uBayAvinam ||
   RV_8,001.03a yac cid dhi tvā janā ime nānā havanta ūtaye |	RV_8,001.03a yat cit Di tvA janAH ime nAnA havantaH Utaye |
   RV_8,001.03c asmākam brahmedam indra bhūtu te 'hā viśvā ca vardhanam ||	RV_8,001.03c asmAkam brahma idam indra BUtu te ahA viSvA ca varDanam ||
   RV_8,001.04a vi tartūryante maghavan vipaścito 'ryo vipo janānām |	RV_8,001.04a vi tartUryante maGavan vipaScitaH aryaH vipaH janAnAm |
   RV_8,001.04c upa kramasva pururūpam ā bhara vājaṃ nediṣṭham ūtaye ||	RV_8,001.04c upa kramasva puru rUpam A Bara vAjam nedizWam Utaye ||
   RV_8,001.05a mahe cana tvām adrivaḥ parā śulkāya deyām |	RV_8,001.05a mahe cana tvAm adrivaH parA SulkAya deyAm |
   RV_8,001.05c na sahasrāya nāyutāya vajrivo na śatāya śatāmagha ||	RV_8,001.05d na sahasrAya na ayutAya vajrivaH na SatAya SatAmaGa ||
   RV_8,001.06a vasyāṃ indrāsi me pitur uta bhrātur abhuñjataḥ |	RV_8,001.06a vasyAm indra asi me pituH uta BrAtuH aBuQjataH |
   RV_8,001.06c mātā ca me chadayathaḥ samā vaso vasutvanāya rādhase ||	RV_8,001.06c mAtA ca me CadayaTaH samAH vasaH vasutvanAya rADase ||

   RV_8,001.07c alarṣi yudhma khajakṛt purandara pra gāyatrā agāsiṣuḥ ||	RV_8,001.07c ala rzi yuDma Kaja kRt purandara pra gAyatrAH agAsizuH ||
   RV_8,001.08a prāsmai gāyatram arcata vāvātur yaḥ purandaraḥ |	RV_8,001.08a prA asmE gAyatram arcata vAvAtuH yaH purandaraH |
   RV_8,001.08c yābhiḥ kāṇvasyopa barhir āsadaṃ yāsad vajrī bhinat puraḥ ||	RV_8,001.08t yABiH kANu asya upa barhiH Asadam yAsat vajrI Binat puras ||
   RV_8,001.09a ye te santi daśagvinaḥ śatino ye sahasriṇaḥ |	RV_8,001.09a ye te santi daSagvinaH SatinaH ye sahasriNaH |
   RV_8,001.09c aśvāso ye te vṛṣaṇo raghudruvas tebhir nas tūyam ā gahi ||	RV_8,001.09c aSvAsaH ye te vRzaNaH raGudruvaH teBiH naH tUyam A gahi ||
   RV_8,001.10a ā tv adya sabardughāṃ huve gāyatravepasam |	RV_8,001.10aH A tu adya sa barduGAm huve gAyatra vepasam |

   RV_8,006.48c śravasā yādvaṃ janam ||	RV_8,006.48c SravasA yAdvam janam ||

   RV_8,007.01c vi parvateṣu rājatha ||	RV_8,007.01c vi parvatezu rAjaTa ||

   RV_9,004.05a tvaṃ sūrye na ā bhaja tava kratvā tavotibhiḥ |	RV_9,004.05a tvam sUrye na A Baja tava kratvA tava utiBiH |
   RV_9,004.05c athā no vasyasas kṛdhi ||	RV_9,004.05c aTAH naH vasyasaH kRDi ||

   RV_9,110.03a ajījano hi pavamāna sūryaṃ vidhāre śakmanā payaḥ |	RV_9,110.03a ajIjanaH hi pavamAna sUryam viDAre SakmanA payaH |
   RV_9,110.03c gojīrayā raṃhamāṇaḥ purandhyā ||	RV_9,110.03t go jIrayA raMhamANaH puranDyAH ||
   RV_9,110.04a ajījano amṛta martyeṣv āṃ ṛtasya dharmann amṛtasya cāruṇaḥ |	RV_9,110.04a ajIjanaH amRta martyezu Am Rtasya Darman amRtasya ca aruNaH |
   RV_9,110.04c sadāsaro vājam acchā saniṣyadat ||	RV_9,110.04c sadA asaraH vAjam acCA sanizyadat ||
   RV_9,110.05a abhy abhi hi śravasā tatardithotsaṃ na kaṃ cij janapānam	RV_9,110.05a aBy aBi hi SravasA tatardiTa utsam na kam cit jana pAnam
   akṣitam |	akzitam |
   RV_9,110.05c śaryābhir na bharamāṇo gabhastyoḥ ||	RV_9,110.05c SaryABiH na BaramANaH gaBastyoH ||
   RV_9,110.06a ād īṃ ke cit paśyamānāsa āpyaṃ vasuruco divyā abhy anūṣata |	RV_9,110.06e At Im ke cit paSyamAnAsaH Apyam vasu rucaH divyAH aBi anUzata |
   RV_9,110.06c vāraṃ na devaḥ savitā vy ūrṇute ||	RV_9,110.06t vAram na devaH savitA vi UrNute ||
   RV_9,110.07a tve soma prathamā vṛktabarhiṣo mahe vājāya śravase dhiyaṃ	RV_9,110.07a tve soma praTamA vRkta barhizaH mahe vAjAya Sravase Diyam
   dadhuḥ |	daDuH |
   RV_9,110.07c sa tvaṃ no vīra vīryāya codaya ||	RV_9,110.07c sa tvam naH vIra vIryAya codaya ||

   adhukṣata |	aDukzata |

   RV_9,110.09c yūthe na niṣṭhā vṛṣabho vi tiṣṭhase ||	RV_9,110.09t yUTe na nizWA vRzaBaH vi tizWase ||
   RV_9,110.10a somaḥ punāno avyaye vāre śiśur na krīḷan pavamāno akṣāḥ |	RV_9,110.10a somaH punAnaH avyaye vAre SiSuH na krI?an pavamAnaH akzAH |

   RV_10,001.02a sa jāto garbho asi rodasyor agne cārur vibhṛta oṣadhīṣu |	RV_10,001.02a sa jAtaH garBaH asi rodasyoH agne cAruH viBRtaH ozaDIzu |

   RV_10,001.04a ata u tvā pitubhṛto janitrīr annāvṛdham prati caranty annaiḥ	RV_10,001.04a atas u tvA pitu BRtaH janitrIH annAvRDam prati caranti annEH
